checked.$description: Background color for checked checkbox. Follows accent button logic for status indication.

checkedDisabled.$description: Background color for checked and disabled checkbox

indeterminate.$description: Background color for indeterminate checkbox. Same as unchecked for visual similarity.

indeterminateHover.$description: Background color on hover (indeterminate). Same as unchecked.

indeterminateDisabled.$description: Background color for indeterminate and disabled checkbox

base.$description: Border color for unchecked checkbox. More contrast than default border (neutral.300) - uses neutral.400 for better visibility on small checkbox element.

checked.$description: Border color for checked checkbox. One shade darker than checked background (accent.700) for visual consistency and size parity with unchecked state.

disabled.$description: Border color for disabled checkbox. More visible than base (neutral.400) but still clearly disabled state.

checkedDisabled.$description: Border color for checked and disabled checkbox. Same as disabled for consistent visibility.

hover.$description: Border color on hover (unchecked). Same as base for consistency.

checkedHover.$description: Border color on hover (checked). Same as checked for consistency.

indeterminate.$description: Border color for indeterminate checkbox. Same as unchecked for visual similarity.

indeterminateHover.$description: Border color on hover (indeterminate). Same as unchecked.

indeterminateDisabled.$description: Border color for indeterminate and disabled checkbox. Same as disabled for consistency.

base.$description: Checkmark color (white/light for contrast on brand background)

disabled.$description: Checkmark color for disabled checkbox. Matches border color for consistency.

indeterminate.$description: Indeterminate mark color (square inside). Lighter accent color (accent.400) than checked background (accent.700) to indicate partial selection.

indeterminateDisabled.$description: Indeterminate mark color for disabled checkbox. Matches border color for consistency.
